TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi PeerNameResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定使用 PNRP 命名空间提供程序 API 协议将 解析为 的值。

span.span: Specifies the values that resolve a to a using the PNRP Namespace Provider API protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个其中包含的所有信息中发布的或在解析过程中查询的云。A which contains all the information for the that was published in the or cloud(s) that were queried during the resolve process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在成功解决后，则包含指定的所有信息过程中查询的群中发布的操作。After successfully resolving a , the contains all the information for the specified that was published in the cloud(s) that were queried during the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnResolveCompleted(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 对象，包含 事件返回的数据。

span.span: The object that contains the data returned by the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件后，将返回对等解析数据。

span.span: Returns peer resolution data after the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是用来处理对等名称解析数据后对等解析已完成的异步回调。This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer name resolution data after peer resolution has completed. 派生的类型可以重写此方法来执行其他任务时对等解析程序对象引发事件。Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event is raised by the peer resolver object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnResolveProgressChanged(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 对象，它包含由 事件返回的对等名称解析进度信息。

span.span: object that contains peer name resolution progress information returned by the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件时，将返回对等解析进度数据。

span.span: Returns peer resolution progress data when the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是用来处理对等解析数据后已请求对等解析进度的异步回调。This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer resolution data after peer resolution progress has been requested. 派生的类型可以重写此方法来执行其他任务时事件发生。Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.

span.para: 当重写此方法在派生类型中的，则一定要调用的基类型方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding this method in a derived type, be sure to call the base type's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 使用 PNRP 协议将 对象解析为 。

span.span: Resolves a object to a using the PNRP protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将关联到云的对等名称。This method associates peer names to clouds. 调用方法是类似于调用方法中每个对等名称记录。Calling the method is similar to calling the method for each peer name record in the . 请注意，使用上的各个对等名称记录解决方法不会导致失效解析多个对等名称。Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names. 对于每个方法中，没有等效项方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们是中传递的参数完全相同，只不过 ResolveAsync 方法在异步事件处理其参数列表中包含的系统标记。They are identical in the parameters they are passed, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token in its parameter list for asynchronous event handling. 如果未提供参数，该方法使用快捷方式填充云参数。If the parameter is not supplied, the method uses the shortcut to fill in cloud parameters. 如果`maxRecords`缺少参数，默认值为零的原因的引发异常。If the `maxRecords` parameter is missing, the default value of zero causes an exception to be thrown. 如果解析操作完成时出错或被取消，则也将引发此事件。This event will also be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection Resolve(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName peerName) cil managed

param.name: peerName
param.span: 要解析的 。

span.span: The to resolve.

summary.span: 解析调用对等方已知的所有群中指定的 。

span.span: Resolves the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer.

returns.span: 包含与指定的对等名称关联的所有对等名称记录（表示为 对象）的 。

span.span: A that contains all peer name records (represented as objects) associated with the specified peer name.

returns.span: 对于不安全的对等名称，可由不同的用户在同一个 中注册同一个 ，并将其与不同的终结点关联。

span.span: For unsecured peer names, the same can be registered by different users in the same , and associated with different endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将关联到云的对等名称。This method associates a peer name to clouds. 所有云进行都查询以获得。All clouds are queried for the . 如果对等名称无法解析或者`null`、引发。If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an is thrown. 对于不安全的对等名称，相同的名称可注册 （、 与不同的终结点相关联） 的同一云内的其他对等方。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 调用方法是类似于调用方法中每个对等名称记录。Calling the method is similar to calling the method for each peer name record in the . 请注意，使用上的各个对等名称记录解决方法不会导致失效解析多个对等名称。Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names. 对于每个方法中，没有等效项方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是完全相同，只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包括异步事件处理系统令牌。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果未提供参数，该方法使用快捷方式填充云参数。If the parameter is not supplied, the method uses the shortcut to fill in cloud parameters. 如果解析操作完成时出错或被取消，则将引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何解决发布任何。The following code example illustrates how to resolve a published in any . [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPPeerNameResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPPeerNameResolver/CS/PeerNameResolver.cs#1)]

span.span: The parameter is set to .

exception.span: 指定的对等名称无法解析。

span.span: The peer name specified cannot be resolved.

span.span: Resolves the specified peer name in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than the specified number of objects.

returns.span: 大小小于或等于 条目的 。

span.span: A whose size is less than or equal to entries.

span.span: This collection contains peer name records associated with the that was resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将关联到云的对等名称。This method associates a peer name to clouds. 所有云的对等名称都查询。All clouds are queried for the peer name. 对于不安全的对等名称，可通过在同一个不同的用户注册相同的对等名称，并与不同的终结点相关联。For unsecured peer names, the same peer name can be registered by different users in the same , and associated with different endpoints. 如果无法解析 （例如，未发布的对等名称）引发。If the cannot be resolved (for example, the peer name is not published) an is thrown. 对于每个方法中，没有等效项方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是完全相同，只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包括异步事件处理系统令牌。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果解析操作完成时出错或被取消，则将引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

span.span: The parameter is set to .
The parameter is less than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 提供的对等名称无法解析。

span.span: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果无法解析 （即，未发布的对等名称）引发。If the cannot be resolved (i.e., the peer name is not published) an is thrown. 对于不安全的对等名称，相同的名称可注册 （、 与不同的终结点相关联） 的同一云内的其他对等方。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 对于每个方法中，没有等效项方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是完全相同，只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包括异步事件处理系统令牌。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果参数是`null`，则使用快捷方式填充， ，和。If the parameter is `null`, the uses the shortcut to fill in the , , and . 如果解析操作完成时出错或被取消，则将引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于不安全的对等名称，相同的名称可注册 （、 与不同的终结点相关联） 的同一云内的其他对等方。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 如果对等名称无法解析，引发。If the peer name cannot be resolved, an is thrown. 对于每个方法中，没有等效项方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是完全相同，只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包括异步事件处理系统令牌。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果参数是`null`，则使用快捷方式填充， ，和。If the parameter is `null`, the uses the shortcut to fill in the , , and . 如果解析操作完成时出错或被取消，则将引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

summary.span: 这些方法在调用对等方已知的所有群中开始指定 的异步解析操作。

span.span: These methods begin an asynchronous resolution operation for the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于每个方法中，没有等效项方法，它需要异步处理时使用。For every method, there is an equivalent method, which is used when asynchronous processing is required. 它们完全在传递的参数相同，只不过 ResolveAsync 事件处理其参数列表中包含的系统标记。They are identical in the parameters they are passed, except that ResolveAsync includes a system token in its parameter list for event handling. 如果参数不匹配的解决方法和 ResolveAsync 方法之间发生并未提供参数，该方法使用快捷方式填充云参数。If a parameter mismatch occurs between the Resolve method and the ResolveAsync method, and the parameter is not supplied, the method uses the shortcut to fill in cloud parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResolveAsync (System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName peerName, object userState);
.method public hidebysig instance void ResolveAsync(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName peerName, object userState) cil managed

param.name: peerName
param.span: 要解析的 。

summary.span: 在调用对等方已知的所有云中为指定 开始异步对等名称解析操作。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法以异步方式将关联到云的对等名称。This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds. 所有云进行都查询以获得。All clouds are queried for the . 它会发出事件，该回调到事件方法。It raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者，它会发出事件，该回调到事件方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. 如果对等名称无法解析，引发。If the peer name cannot be resolved, an is thrown. 对于不安全的对等名称，相同的名称可注册 （、 与不同的终结点相关联） 的同一云内的其他对等方。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 调用方法是类似于调用方法中每个对等名称记录。Calling the method is similar to calling the method for each peer name record in the . 请注意，使用上的各个对等名称记录解决方法不会导致失效解析多个对等名称。Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names. 对于每个方法中，没有等效项方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是完全相同，只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包括异步事件处理系统令牌和解决方法适用于同步处理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 所有异步解析程序对象引用均与一个唯一标识符标记相协调。All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token. 这`userState`标记或消息标识符允许操作系统之后消息已放在消息队列将消息传送到单个接收进程。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析操作完成时出错或被取消，则将引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

exception.span: 将 和/或 参数设置为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法以异步方式将关联到云的对等名称。This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds. 所有云进行都查询以获得。All clouds are queried for the . 对于不安全的对等名称，相同的名称可注册 （、 与不同的终结点相关联） 的同一云内的其他对等方。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 如果对等名称无法解析或者`null`、引发。If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an is thrown. 此方法将引发事件，该回调到事件方法。This method raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者，它会发出事件，该回调到事件方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. 对于每个方法中，没有等效项方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是完全相同，只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包括异步事件处理系统令牌和解决方法适用于同步处理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 所有异步解析程序对象引用均与一个唯一标识符标记协调。All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token . 这`userState`标记或消息标识符允许操作系统之后消息已放在消息队列将消息传送到单个接收进程。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析操作完成时出错或被取消，则将引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

summary.span: 该解析操作为指定的对等名称所解析的条目不会超过 个。

span.span: The resolution operation will resolve no more than entries for the specified peer name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于不安全的对等名称，相同的名称可注册 （、 与不同的终结点相关联） 的同一云内的其他对等方。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 此方法将引发事件，该回调到事件方法。This method raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者，它会发出事件，该回调到事件方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. 如果参数是`null`，使用解析名称快捷方式，这将初始化为默认值， ，并属性。If the parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the shortcut, which initializes default values for the , , and properties. 对于每个方法中，没有等效项方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是完全相同，只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包括异步事件处理系统令牌和解决方法适用于同步处理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 所有异步对等解析程序对象引用均与一个唯一标识符标记协调。All asynchronous references to the peer resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token . 这`userState`标记或消息标识符允许操作系统之后消息已放在消息队列将消息传送到单个接收进程。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析操作完成时出错或被取消，则将引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

exception.span: 将 和/或 参数设置为 。

span.span: One or both of the and parameters are set to .

exception.span: 提供的一个或多个参数均无效。

span.span: One or more supplied parameters are invalid.

exception.span: 要成功完成此操作至少需要一个事件处理程序。

span.span: Successful completion of this operation requires at least one event handler.
The parameter is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveAsyncCancel(object userState) cil managed

param.name: userState
param.span: 向启动解析操作的 方法实例提供的对象。

span.span: The object provided to the method instance which started the resolve operation.

summary.span: 取消指定的异步对等名称解析请求。

span.span: Cancels the specified asynchronous peer name resolution request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可确保系统不会尝试获取指定的其他记录。Calling this method guarantees the system will not attempt to obtain additional records for the specified . 如果是未完成的异步对等名称解析操作时调用此方法，它将充当"无操作"(NO OP)。If this method is called when an asynchronous peer name resolution operation is not outstanding, it acts as a "no operation" (NO OP). `userState`必须提供对象，因为它用于跟踪特定的异步调用时多个调用正在进行中。The `userState` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call when multiple calls are in progress. 此调用方提供的对象是唯一的每个对等名称解析请求。This caller-supplied object is unique for each peer name resolution request. 此方法会立即返回，但可能会或可能无法立即取消该操作。This method will return immediately, but the operation may or may not immediately cancel. 返回的事件参数事件包含的字段可能可以通过客户端来确定是否取消了轮询。The event arguments returned by the event contains a field which can be polled by clients to determine whether cancellation occurred. 调用此方法可确保 ResolveCompleted 事件尽可能快地发出信号，使用事件自变量设置为`true`。Calling this method ensures the ResolveCompleted event will be signaled as soon as possible with the event argument set to `true`.

span.span: The parameters cannot be .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ResolveCompleted As EventHandler(Of ResolveCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 特定 的对等名称解析请求完成时发出 事件信号。

span.span: The event is signaled when a peer name resolution request for a specific has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将每个终结点发现，一次引发事件并仅当已找到的所有终结点后，将引发此事件。The event will be raised once for each endpoint found, and this event will be raised only once when all endpoints have been found. 如果还会引发此事件操作完成时出错或被取消。This event will also be raised if the operation completes in error or is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ResolveProgressChanged As EventHandler(Of ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 每当发现 对象时会发出有关此事件的信号，以响应针对特定 的 操作。

span.span: This event is signaled whenever a object is found in response to a operation for a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果多个对其进行查询的群中存在的对象，此事件发出信号一次为每个找到。If multiple objects exist in the cloud(s) being queried, this event is signaled once for each found.
